subject: Broken Plastic Spring Guide
description_text:
Hello, I recently purchased the Pro Plus pedals on amazon. I had them for a
few days and were making adjustments when the plastic spring guide on the
brake pedal shattered while braking. I was wondering if there was any way
that I was able to get a replacement since it is not offered on the
website. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Tyler Davis,  Please send us a photo, and we will promptly ship replacement parts for the damaged items. Also, please provide your order number, contact person, phone number, and shipping address.

I cannot take a picture of it because it disintegrated, but I can send a picture of the area of where it was supposed to go. At the moment I am using the plastic washers included, but the brake is not performing correctly with that.

Sent with Spark

Hi Tyler Davis,  If you have adjusted the pedal damping, springs, or other mechanical parts, please first make sure all pedals are properly connected to the main controller. Then reconnect the USB cable, click the Offset button in the software to reset the initial pedal signal (the white progress bar will return to zero), and finally recalibrate the pedals.

How am I supposed to send a picture of the plastic piece if it broke into a bunch of tiny pieces

Sent with Spark
Hi Tyler Davis,  Please take a photo of the current product and send it to us. I will check which part is missing and arrange a replacement for you.

Perfect. Here it is

Sent with Spark
Hi Tyler Davis,  We will send you this part as a replacement the day after tomorrow.

Perfect, thank you!

Sent with Spark
Hi Tyler Davis,  Could you please provide your order number and shipping address?

Sorry for the late reply. My order was for amazon and the order # is  *Order
# 111-3028437-2729851*

*My shipping address is 142 Skyline Ln, Powell, TN 37849*

On Sun, Jan 4, 2026 at 1:35 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Tyler Davis,  OK. We will ship the replacement to you ASAP.
Has there been a tracking number provided for this?
Hi Tyler Davis,  Here is your tracking number: SF6047227003054.   the shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
